dict.acceptation: 公司，商号；作伴，伴侣，客人；连队，中队；（社交）集会，聚会；

sent.orig: PAK-GERMAN COMPANY offers information to working gloves in addition to Protective gloves.
sent.trans: GERMAN COMPANY是一家令客户满意的生产商和服务商，该公司提供新型的、专门的产品，例如作业手套，防护手套。

sent.orig: Welcome to our company from all the members of this.
sent.trans: company.很高兴欢迎史密斯先生到我们公司来。

sent.orig: The company a subsidiary of the company, the company a 62 percent of the company.
sent.trans: 该公司是本公司控股子公司，本公司持有该公司62％股权。

sent.orig: Welcome each export trade company, gift company, leather products company, stationery company to negotiate and cooperate.
sent.trans: 欢迎各出口贸易公司、礼品公司、皮具制品公司、文具用品公司等客户前来洽谈合作！

sent.orig: As a telecommunication apparatus company DDD Company is very different from our trade company.
sent.trans: DDD公司是一家电讯器材公司，与偶们公司的贸易公司有很大区别。
